title: WhereYou? -(Find Your Friends)
summary: Find your MIA (or not) friends in one click!
description: If you've ever waited half an hour for your friend to show up at Starbucks, WhereYou! If you've ever been bored on campus and wanted to see who's free, WhereYou! This description reads like a terrible infomercial, WhereYou!Pick a username*, add your friends, and find each other without ever sending a single 'where are you brah' message on Facebook. Just tap their name and if they accept your request, a handy map pops up that shows you exactly where they are... AT THAT VERY MOMENT!!!!For all of you who are worried about things like 'security' and 'privacy', this app works on a ask-and-tell basis. No one can see your location unless you explicitly grant them your permission (in the form of notification)!This is a very early version of the app, so any feedback would be awesome, email me at tony.huang.jun@gmail.com.ANDROID WEAR: For all of you wearable fanatics out there, simply say 'start whereyou' and you can use the app on your watch just like your phone! Also view your friends' locations, right on your wrist!Also, please DON'T spam your friends. Everytime you click their name, they get a notification. So uhh... be nice.WHEREYOU!!!!! YEAHHHHHHP.S. If you download this app and find out you don't have any friends, I'll be your friend :) My username is tony (edit: not it's not, I keep changing usernames as part of the development process, sorryyyy)* Note: pick carefully, once you choose your username you can't change it without losing all of your friends kekeke (that means uninstall and reinstall)
descriptionHTML:
If you've ever waited half an hour for your friend to show up at Starbucks, WhereYou! If you've ever been bored on campus and wanted to see who's free, WhereYou! This description reads like a terrible infomercial, WhereYou!

Pick a username*, add your friends, and find each other without ever sending a single 'where are you brah' message on Facebook. Just tap their name and if they accept your request, a handy map pops up that shows you exactly where they are... AT THAT VERY MOMENT!!!!

For all of you who are worried about things like 'security' and 'privacy', this app works on a ask-and-tell basis. No one can see your location unless you explicitly grant them your permission (in the form of notification)!

This is a very early version of the app, so any feedback would be awesome, email me at tony.huang.jun@gmail.com.

ANDROID WEAR: For all of you wearable fanatics out there, simply say 'start whereyou' and you can use the app on your watch just like your phone! Also view your friends' locations, right on your wrist!

Also, please DON'T spam your friends. Everytime you click their name, they get a notification. So uhh... be nice.

WHEREYOU!!!!! YEAHHHHHH

P.S. If you download this app and find out you don't have any friends, I'll be your friend :) My username is tony (edit: not it's not, I keep changing usernames as part of the development process, sorryyyy)

* Note: pick carefully, once you choose your username you can't change it without losing all of your friends kekeke (that means uninstall and reinstall)
comments: Good start Basic but solid so far. Ideas: google sign-in, locations from ppl without the app
recentChanges: Who has an Android watch?? Oh, it's just me. ANYWAY, SAY 'start whereyou' TO YOUR WATCH FOR CRAZY FUN (balloon emoji)
Allison be like all up in my styles
Wah wah my app keeps crashing wah wah. NOT ANYMORE
For those of you with more than one friend (liars), now you can have more than one map open at a time!!!!!
Point system so you know who you love the most <3
